member.summary: Custom module catalog facilitating the loading of HAL extension modules.

member.name: P:HAL.UI.WPF.Compatibility.DynamicModuleCatalog.ModulePath
member.summary: Directory containing modules to search for.

member.name: M:HAL.UI.WPF.Compatibility.DynamicModuleCatalog.InnerLoad
member.summary: Drives the main logic of building the child domain and searching for the assemblies.

member.name: M:HAL.UI.WPF.Compatibility.DynamicModuleCatalog.BuildChildDomain(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Creates a new child domain and copies the evidence from a parent domain.
member.remarks: Grabs the evidence and uses it to construct the new because in a ClickOnce execution environment, creating an will by default pick up the partial trust environment of the AppLaunch.exe, which was the root executable. The AppLaunch.exe does a create domain and applies the evidence from the ClickOnce manifests to create the domain that the application is actually executing in. This will need to be Full Trust for Composite Application Library applications.
member.exception: An is thrown if is null.

member.summary: Adds a range of items to a collection.
member.typeparam: Type of objects within the collection.
member.param: The collection to add items to.
The items to add to the collection.
member.exception: An is thrown if or is .
